sentence.Network_en: The life cycle of maize is that of a typical angiosperm.

sentence.Network_en: This latter statement finds support in contemporary works on angiosperm embryology.

sentence.Network_en: Other angiosperm cultures based on totipotent cells could be adapted to similar ends.
